name: DEMYSTIX - Early Demo
description:
DEMYSTIX

GarughAde, popular soda company & ruler of the entire world has started the "DEMYSTIX" tournament, where the aim is to kill as many "Demystik" creatures as possible within a certain amount of time. The prize? An all you can eat Buffet with President Garugh himself. But, what is GarughAde truly up to? There's only one way to find out!

DEMYSTIX is an arcade-style game in which the aim is to score as many points as possible within 2 minutes. The game includes Single Player and Multiplayer modes. (Multiplayer Is Local Only and has not been properly tested yet).

Characters:

DEMYSTIX has 3 playable characters and an unlockable 4th character. (The 4th character will not be accesible until the final game).

Marcia

Marcia genuinly wants to make the world a better place, but she always lets her anger get in the way. She usually starts fights in every room she enters and often takes things to the extreme. She entered the tournament in hopes of shutting down GarughAde.

Greflek

Greflek is a Demystik. He used to live away from humanity with the rest of his species, but because of a disagreement with the Demystik King, he was kicked out. He entered the tournament because he wanted to find out why GarughAde was using his species for profit.

David

Nobody knows what David is or where he came from. He's oblivious to pretty much everything around him and prefers to mind his own business. He also likes food. David literally only entered the tournament because he wanted the All You Can Eat Buffet.

Fun David Fact: David has a tiny planet with real, tiny people proudly displayed in his living room. The people on that planet treat David like a god.

Default Controls:

Left And Right Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Jump

X - Attack

Up Arrow - Up Attack

Down Arrow - Down Attack (Marcia & Greflek Only)

Up + C - Activate Mystik Form

C - Mystik Attack
